AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = USER_ID) = #{search}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS WHERE DEL=0
SELECT SUM( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 0 AND STEP = 0) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_QNA WHERE STATUS = 0 ) ) AS WAIT_QNA FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE AUTH = 0) AS TOTAL ,(SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE SNS_TYPE = 'none' AND AUTH = 0) AS BITCAMPING, (SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE SNS_TYPE = 'kakao' AND AUTH = 0) AS KAKAO, (SELECT count(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE SNS_TYPE = 'naver' AND AUTH = 0) AS NAVER FROM DUAL

SELECT ROWNUM, TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( SELECT TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT WHERE COMMUNITY_BBS.COMMUNITY_SEQ = COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT.COMMUNITY_SEQ AND DEL = 0) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM COMMUNITY_BBS WHERE BBSTYPE = 'find' AND DEL = 0 ORDER BY WDATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 7
UNION
SELECT ROWNUM, TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( SELECT TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT WHERE COMMUNITY_BBS.COMMUNITY_SEQ = COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT.COMMUNITY_SEQ AND DEL = 0) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM COMMUNITY_BBS WHERE BBSTYPE = 'free' AND DEL = 0 ORDER BY WDATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 7
UNION
SELECT ROWNUM, TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( SELECT TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT WHERE COMMUNITY_BBS.COMMUNITY_SEQ = COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT.COMMUNITY_SEQ AND DEL = 0) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM COMMUNITY_BBS WHERE (BBSTYPE = 'sell' or BBSTYPE = 'buy' or BBSTYPE = 'soldout') AND DEL = 0 ORDER BY WDATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 7
UNION
SELECT ROWNUM, TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( SELECT TITLE, BBSTYPE, WDATE, COMMUNITY_SEQ, (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT WHERE COMMUNITY_BBS.COMMUNITY_SEQ = COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT.COMMUNITY_SEQ AND DEL = 0) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM COMMUNITY_BBS WHERE BBSTYPE = 'review' AND DEL = 0 ORDER BY WDATE DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 7

SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, USER_ID, NICKNAME, TITLE, WDATE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, DEL, BBSTYPE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS_COMMENT WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = C.COMMUNITY_SEQ AND DEL = 0) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY WDATE DESC) AS RNUM, COMMUNITY_SEQ, USER_ID, NICKNAME, TITLE, WDATE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, DEL, BBSTYPE FROM COMMUNITY_BBS A, MEMBER B WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = B.ID AND DEL = 0 AND (A.BBSTYPE = 'sell' OR A.BBSTYPE = 'buy' OR A.BBSTYPE = 'soldout')
AND BBSTYPE = 'sell'
AND BBSTYPE = 'buy'
AND BBSTYPE = 'soldout'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY WDATE DESC ) C WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM COMMUNITY_BBS A, MEMBER B WHERE 1=1 AND A.USER_ID = B.ID AND DEL = 0 AND (A.BBSTYPE = 'sell' OR A.BBSTYPE = 'buy' OR A.BBSTYPE = 'soldout')
AND BBSTYPE = 'sell'
AND BBSTYPE = 'buy'
AND BBSTYPE = 'soldout'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT REVIEW_SEQ, CONTENTID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, READCOUNT, USER_ID, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = USER_ID) AS NICKNAME, REVISIT, LIKE_COUNT, DEL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAMPING_BBS_COMMENT WHERE C.REVIEW_SEQ = CAMPING_BBS_COMMENT.REVIEW_SEQ AND DEL = 0) AS COMMENTCOUNT, (SELECT FACLTNM FROM CAMPING_LIST WHERE C.CONTENTID = CAMPING_LIST.CONTENTID) AS CAMPINGNAME FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY WDATE DESC) AS RNUM, REVIEW_SEQ, CONTENTID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, READCOUNT, USER_ID, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = USER_ID) AS NICKNAME, REVISIT, LIKE_COUNT, DEL FROM CAMPING_BBS WHERE 1=1 AND DEL = 0
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND (SELECT FACLTNM FROM CAMPING_LIST WHERE CAMPING_BBS.CONTENTID = CAMPING_LIST.CONTENTID) LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
ORDER BY WDATE DESC ) C WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM CAMPING_BBS WHERE 1=1 AND DEL = 0
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND (SELECT FACLTNM FROM CAMPING_LIST WHERE CAMPING_BBS.CONTENTID = CAMPING_LIST.CONTENTID) LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
